description: All components share the same version for guaranteed compatibility

fazt-binary.description: Core Go binary - HTTP server, auth, storage, runtime

admin.description: Web admin UI - Dashboard functional, other pages in progress
admin.goal: Full API surface coverage with polished UX

fazt-sdk.description: Universal JS API client for admin + apps with upload progress and pagination
fazt-sdk.goal: Complete API coverage, types, error handling
